dinosaur.name: Triceratops
dinosaur.description: A Triceratops has three big pointy tusks.

dinosaur.name: Pterodactyl
dinosaur.description: A Pterodactyl can fly round at high speeds.

dinosaur.name: Brontosaurus
dinosaur.description: A Brontosaurus is big and scary.

dinosaur.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
dinosaur.description: A Tyrannosaurus Rex would eat you.

dinosaur.name: Stegosaurus
dinosaur.description: A Stegosaurus has lots of spiny plates.
